The transportation industry would undergo a significant shift, leading to a reduction in carbon emissions and air pollution.
The demand for fuel would decrease, potentially leading to a decrease in oil prices.
The cost of owning a car would decrease significantly, as cars would become less expensive to maintain and operate.
The cycling industry would experience significant growth, leading to the creation of new jobs and businesses.
The cities would become more pedestrian-friendly, with more bike lanes and dedicated bike paths being created.
